result.eng: This is the road to the south.
result.ga: Seo an an bóthar ó dheas
result.orig: Seo an an bóthar ó dheas
result.html: Seo an an bóthar ó dheasThis is the road to the south.
result.ponchtml: Seo an an bóṫar ó ḋeasThis is the road to the south.

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.orig: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.html: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic TheasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic ṪeasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.

result.eng: Tomás in South Africa - on the missions.
result.ga: San Afraic Theas atá Tomás - ar na misin
result.orig: San Afraic Theas atá Tomás - ar na misin
result.html: San Afraic Theas atá Tomás - ar na misinTomás in South Africa - on the missions.
result.ponchtml: San Afraic Ṫeas atá Tomás - ar na misinTomás in South Africa - on the missions.

result.eng: There was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ga: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.orig: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.html: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gaineaṁ do gaċ leiṫ dínn soir siar ṫuaiḋ ṫeasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.

result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ga: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.orig: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.html: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidhThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ponchtml: Ṫug túr ṫeas an Lárionad Trádála uaiḋThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
